previous_statement: SIZE-3 CHECK: For each partition, verify h_1, h_2, h_3 do not all preserve it. Example: {{1,2,3},{4,5,6}} under h_1=(1 6 4 3): h_1({1,2,3})={6,2,4}∉{{1,2,3},{4,5,6}}. All 10 fail. QED.
new_statement: SIZE-3 CHECK: For each partition, verify h_1, h_2, h_3 do not all preserve it. Example: {{1,2,3},{4,5,6}} under h_1=(1 6 4 3): h_1({1,2,3})={6,2,1}={1,2,6}∉{{1,2,3},{4,5,6}}. All 10 fail. QED.
